description: Umwana urwaye impiswi agira umwuma bikaba byamuviramo no gupfa.
title: Umwana urwaye impiswi agira umwuma bikaba byamuviramo no gupfa.
content:
Umwana urwaye impiswi agira umwuma bikaba byamuviramo no gupfa. Niyo 
mpamvu, mu kumurinda umwuma ukabije ari ngombwa kumuha ibinyobwa n’
ibiribwa kenshi kuva agifatwa.

Iyo umwana yituma ibyoroshye cyane gatatu cyangwa birenze ku munsi aba 
arwaye impiswi. Uko inshuro ziyongera, ni na ko biba bigenda birushaho kuba 
bibi. Icyo gihe umwana aba agomba kunywa no konka kenshi kugira ngo 
bisimbure ibyo atakaza ahitwa.
